text:
I choose to learn English at school because my two parents are English teacher, specially my father. My father is teaching English at university and it's the reason why I chose to learn English and being teacher. My father is my first inspiration for me because  he is really good in her speciality, his favorite speciality is English history, he write lots of books about this.
When I was young, with my twin sister we went to university with my dad to seeing him when he make classroom and that's the reason why I like this. younger with my family we talked English more often at home but last years we are stopping to do this because my little brother coming and they didn't understand why we talk about. For me English is the more importante language because I always know English in my family and I know they really loved it but is not the reason why I would being teacher.
Personally I don't want being a English teacher but I want became elementary teacher because I really like children, I had lots of brothers and I loved to make homework with her because they learned something new with me, I tacked lots of time with my brother and that's why I really want work with children. All of my family are teacher, my dad, my mom and my grandparents, they are all teacher and now I want to do this like her so that's the reason why I'm here, to learn education, to learn teacher profession and I hope being a teacher too.
